name: tail-whip
effect: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.
